description:
Sometimes when I do a shoot I feel like I don't capture a guys' innate sexiness. Sure you can tell Dyson is sexy, but in person, he just oozes sensuality. Hopefully you can see it in his photos and video.
He's very friendly, loves to smile, but you know there is a naughty boy not so subtly hidden just below the surface.
He's pretty well-equipped for a 5'7" guy, and like Flint, he's got an amazing bubble butt. He's friends with Flint and the Prince Twins, so this gang of dudes must really be a force to reckon with at a party or a bar.
Dyson was real good at showing off that ass too. Lot of times I just can't get the guys to even spread their cheeks, but Dyson knew just what we wanted.
He is one hot dude, and you can tell he wants you to come suck his dick...or eat out his hole!
title: Dyson - Solo
